name: Rollercoaster VR Cardboard
description:
If you like Rollercoasters, then this is defiantly for you!

You have two Rollercoasters to choose from (adding more in the future if this goes well).
Also you can select 2 different noses if you like, or just have none.

!!! VR Case (Google Cardboard, Dive, Homido etc) required! To really enjoy this experience as designed, you need a VR Case as a requirement! Otherwise this will not work as expected.

Check here for more infos on what you need to make it work:
https://www.google.com/get/cardboard/
https://www.durovis.com/index.html
http://www.homido.com

!!! Note: This HD version runs best with the top range of devices such as Galaxy Note 4, S6, S7, Edge etc.

Jump on a Virtual Reality 3D Rollercoaster ride and don't forget to look around!

Designed for VR cases such as Cardboard, Durovis Dive, OpenDive, Homido or equivalent.

Feature:
- Select between two Rollercoasters.
- Select 2 different noses or none
- Go Button let you start at your own pace
- Features Tokyo - Akihabara (Akiba) City

Enjoy, but keep your hands inside :)
